amendment.description: Amendment restores funding to SAMHSA's mental health programs, offset with HHS program administration funds.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 154 printed in House Report 115-297 to restore funding to SAMHSA's mental health programs, offset with HHS program administration funds.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Clark (MA) amendment (A136) Agreed to by recorded vote: 225 - 192 (Roll no. 503).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Clark (MA) amendment (A136) Agreed to by recorded vote: 225 - 192 (Roll no. 503).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A136) offered by Ms. Clark (MA).
